alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 9:32AM MDT until April 18 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Lincoln, Union and Sioux Counties. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lincoln, Minnehaha and Lyon Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Murray and Cottonwood Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, agricultural lands along the lower banks of the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Saturday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday morning and continue falling to 9.4 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Sioux River Dell Rapids 12.0 12.3 Sat 9 am 12.2 11.6 10.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
